items.content_html: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.

It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.

items.content_html: Weather App is a lightweight, browser-based application that allows users to search for real-time weather information by city. It uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve current temperature and weather forecasts. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is simple enough to be run locally without needing a backend server.
items.title: Udykay267/Weather-App: Weather App is a lightweight, browser-based application that allows users to search for real-time weather information by city. It uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve current temperature and weather forecasts. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is simple enough to be run locally without needing a backend server.
